EmailTemplate.description: Aero Joule: Send an email to Admin when for Portal Contact is deleted
EmailTemplate.name: Super User Delete
EmailTemplate.subject: User Honeywell ID has been deleted from the My Aerospace portal system.
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello,
The following Honeywell ID has been deleted from MyAerospace.com:
Honeywell ID:{1} Name: {2} Email: {3}
Access to the following MyAerospace tools assigned to this user has been revoked {0}
Note
This email is being sent from unmonitored mailbox. If you need further assistance, please contact a customer support team member at:
1-800-601-3099 For US / Canada (Toll Free) 1-602-365-3099 International
Thank You, Honeywell Aerospace Customer Support Team
CONTACT US ON MYAEROSPACE
